itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: Errore durante la formattazione di "${drive}"
stringsToCheck: A error occurred erasing the disk.
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed, createinstallmedia returned an error while formatting the installer partition, please, erase manually this dirve with disk utility and retry

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: L'app di installazione sembra essere danneggiata o corrotta
stringsToCheck: does not appear to be a valid OS installer application
itemsList.printMessage: macOS install media creation failed, createinstallmedia returned an error about the app you are using, please, check your mac installaltion app and if needed download it again. Many thimes this appens ,because the installer downloaded from the mac app store, does not contains all the needed files or contanins wrong or corrupted files, in many cases the mac app store on a virtual machine does not downloads the full macOS installer application

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: il disco "${drive}" non è più disponibile o collegato al sistema
stringsToCheck: is not a valid volume mount point
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed because the selected volume is no longer available

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: La SIP (System Integrity Protection) è attivata, per favore disattivala e riprova
stringsToCheck: IA app name cookie write failed
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed because of an error while copying needed files, make sure that "${drive}" is working correctly and that the SIP is disasbled, the SIP enabled can be the real issue in mac versions from Catalina and newer

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: Errore durante la copia dei file necessari, assicurati che il disco "${drive}" sia funzionante e collegato al sistema
stringsToCheck: The copy of the installer app failed
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed because the process failed to copy some elements on it, mainly the installer app or it's content, can't be copied or failed to be copied, please check that your target driver is working properly and just in case erase it with disk utility, if that does not work, use another working target device

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: Il processo di creazione è stato chiuso in modo imprevisto, assicurati che il computer non vada in modalità riposo o imbernazione.
stringsToCheck: The bless of the installer disk failed
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed because "${executable}" was suddenly closed or crashed, probably due to some killing or by the computer going into a sleep state.

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: L'app di installazione sembra non essere compatibile con questa versione di macOS, prova a scasricarla nuovamente da App Store e ad usare TINU su una versione di macOS più recente.
stringsToCheck: To use this tool, you must download the macOS installer application on a Mac with
itemsList.printMessage: Installer app not supprted by this mac os version

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: La partizione selezionata non è abbastanza grande per l'app di installazione selezionata, usa una aprtizione più grande e riprova
stringsToCheck: is not large enough for install media.
itemsList.printMessage: The selected drive/partition is not large enough for this macOS installer app, if you want to make an installer of Catalina or later we reccommend you to use a drive/partition of at least 10 gb
Apple script operation cancelled, going to previous screen

itemsList.message:
Creazione del supporto di installazione di macOS
avvenuta con successo.

Grazie per aver usato TINU
Impossibile procedere: Errore sconosciuto, consulta il log per avere più dettagli a riguardo [1]
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation failed, unknown output from "${executable}" while creating the installer, please, erase this dirve with disk utility and retry

itemsList.message: Impossibile procedere: Errore sconosciuto, consulta il log per avere più dettagli a riguardo [2]
itemsList.printMessage: Bootable macOS installer creation on "${drive}" exited with a not normal exit code, see previous lines in the log to get more info about the error
